lead_paragraph: KAYE--Hon. Judith S. The Board and Staff of Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts deeply mourn the passing of the Hon. Judith S. Kaye, former Chief Judge of the New York State Court of Appeals and the first woman to lead the state's judiciary. A passionate supporter of the performing arts, she was a Lincoln Center board member, where she made a lasting contribution as Chairman of the Legal Committee. Judge Kaye also served on the board of Lincoln Center Education and she was honored at our David Rubenstein Atrium Gala in 2013. Her wisdom, leadership and friendship inspired us daily. We offer our sincerest condolences to her children Luisa, Jonathan, and Gordon, their spouses and children, and to her many friends and former colleagues. Katherine Farley, Chairman Jed Bernstein, President Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, Inc. 1/3
